ModuleDescription: In this module, students are challenged with practical experience in advanced bioinformatics research topics spanning database curation, literature text mining, and compute-intensive sequence and 3D structure analysis. Groups will design and carry out a pan-genomic analysis with a high-performance integrated database system. Individual students will learn to use animation software and raw biomolecular structure information as a platform for simulation and hypothesis testing.
Prerequisite: LSM2104 or or LSM2241 and LSM3241 (Life Sciences Students) OR CS2220 (Computational Biology Students)
